thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Innovative Solutions & Support Posts Q1 Loss Per Share $0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Innovative Solutions & Support Posts Q1 Loss Per Share $0.05
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Innovative Solutions And Support Inc :
* INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS & SUPPORT, INC. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.05 * Q1 SALES FELL 10 PERCENT TO $3.1 MILLION * INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS AND SUPPORT - NEW ORDERS IN Q1 OF FISCAL 2018 WERE $3.4 MILLION AND BACKLOG AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $3.3 MILLION, UP 10 PCT FROM SEPT 30, 2017â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
